Stanford Graduate School of Business

Our mission is to create ideas that deepen and advance our understanding of management and with those ideas to develop innovative, principled, and insightful leaders who change the world.









Voices of Stanford GSB













My goal is to be the fastest tortoise in the race… not to chase the shiny new penny. It worked.
Ken Hersh, MBA ’89

          MBA ’89
      







I came to Stanford GSB because business leaders shape ethical norms around new technologies.
Natalie Meurer

          MBA ’23
      







When you know yourself and know why you’re doing something, you have this internal compass.
Nina Chen

          MBA ’23
